meanings.definition: A fungal infection caused by Cryptococcus fungi.
meanings.sent1: Cryptococcosis can be treated with antifungal medications.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with cryptococcosis after running tests.
meanings.sent3: The party jokester dressed up as a giant Cryptococcus fungus to scare everyone, calling it a case of cryptococcosis.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening had spread through her like a case of cryptococcosis, blooming in every corner of her yard.
meanings.sent5: The dark, damp basement was the perfect breeding ground for cryptococcosis to thrive and spread.

meanings.definition: The presence of Cryptococcus fungi in the body, leading to symptoms such as pneumonia or meningitis.
meanings.sent1: The severity of cryptococcosis symptoms can vary from person to person.
meanings.sent2: Cryptococcosis can be life-threatening if not treated promptly.
meanings.sent3: The detective jokingly referred to the mysterious case of missing socks as a 'cryptococcosis outbreak'.
meanings.sent4: The rumors in the small town spread like a case of cryptococcosis, infecting every conversation with intrigue.
meanings.sent5: The shadowy figure in the alley seemed to embody the essence of cryptococcosis, lurking and waiting to strike.
